description: '''Psychedelic rap''' (also known as '''psychedelic hip-hop''') is a [[microgenre]] that fuses [[hip-hop ]] with [[psychedelic music|psychedelia]]. The genre's sound was influenced by [[psychedelic rock]] and [[psychedelic soul|soul]], [[funk]] and [[jazz]], utilizing [[Break (music)|breaks]] and [[sampling (music)|samples]] that create a hallucinogenic effect. [[Psychedelic drug]]s may also play a part in shaping the genre's sound.
